text: Claude Jeancolas (1949 â€“ 17 February 2016) was a French writer, art historian and journalist. He was best known for his expertise on Arthur Rimbaud. He was born in Nancy, France. Jeancolas died in Paris, France from cancer on 17 February 2016. He was aged 66. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2016 deaths Category:People from Nancy Category:Writers from Grand Est Category:French historians Category:French journalists
